Package vooga.towerdefense.factories.actionfactories

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionFactory
    Creates actions based on definitions of the ActionFactory NEEDS TO BE INITIALIZED BEFORE ANYTHING HAPPENS
    ApplyAttributeBuffFactory
    Action factory that creates an applyAttributeBuf action
    AreaOfEffectPackageFactory
    Factory creates an action combo that does an area of effect, for speeding up game creation.
    AttackActionFactory
    A bundle of action factories to make implementing game elements easier
    CreateElementFactory
    factory that creats a create element action
    CreateGameElementFactory
    This is an action factory that builds a CreateElement action.
    DeathPackageFactory
    Factory that creates a combination of deathly attacks.
    FilterTargetsFactory
    Factory for creating filter targets action.
    FindTargetsFactory
    This is an action factory that creates find target actions that give all of their follow up actions the game elements inside their radius
    FollowPathFactory
    Factory for creating FollowPath action, to create followPath actions of different path need different instances of this factory.
    LaunchProjectileFactory
    This is an action factory that builds a LaunchProjectile action.
    LevelTimerActionFactory
    This creates an level timer action.
    ModifyAttributeValueFactory
    This action factory builds a ModifyAttributeValue action.
    ModifyPlayerAttributeFactory
    Factory that builds a modify player attribute action.
    MoveFactory
    Factory for creating move action.
    MoveToTargetFactory
    Factory that creates a MoveToTarget action, constructor needs a String referencing which attribute to be used as move speed.
    OnCollisionFactory
    Factory that creates onCollision action.
    OnDeathFactory
    This is an action factory for creating OnDeath actions.
    PeriodicActionFactory
    Factory that creates periodicAction, the String in constructor is the desired reference to cooldown e.g.
    RemoveGameElementFactory
    This is an action factory that builds RemoveElement actions.
    SelfDestructFactory
    This is an action factory that builds SelfDestruct actions.
    SetAttributeValueFactory
    Factory that creates setAttributeValue action, takes in two Strings: reference and target.
    ShootProjectileFactory
    This is an action factory that builds a LaunchProjectile action.
    SoundActionFactory
    Factory that creates a sound action.
